version_description: Minor bug fixes

- Parkmobile now supports Chase Pay as a payment method
- Improved Nearby Zone accuracy
- Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements

• New and improved benefits for our Preferred Members. Upgrade to Preferred Membership and instantly receive discounts on parking, oil changes, and mobile car washes. Visit our main menu and upgrade your account today!

Support for BMW Connected Drive Users: link your BMW Connected Drive account to Parkmobile, and start on-street parking sessions from the comfort of your car!

Thank you for parking with Parkmobile! You can now see exactly where the open parking spots are around you. Turn on “Availability” from your map to find parking quicker and easier. The Parkmobile 7.0 build also includes crash-fixes and other minor improvements.

Thank you for parking with Parkmobile! You can now see exactly where the open parking spots are around you. Turn on “Availability” from your map to find parking quicker and easier. The Parkmobile 7.0.1 build also includes BMW Connected Drive crash-fixes and other minor improvements.

Thank you for parking with Parkmobile! You can now see exactly where the open parking spots are around you. Turn on “Availability” from your map to find parking quicker and easier.

The Parkmobile 7.0.2 update includes:
- Improvements to the ParkmobilePro Subscription process
- Other crash fixes

The Parkmobile 7.1 build includes: bug fixes and minor enhancements.

Thank you for parking with Parkmobile! You can now see exactly where the open parking spots are around you. Turn on “Availability” from your map to find parking quicker and easier.

Added support for grouping consecutive parking sessions
Minor bug fixes
We squashed a few bugs

Don’t miss a second of the big game or concert because you can’t find parking. Our latest release lets you make event parking reservations right in the ParkMobile app. Just select the “reservations” icon, search for your venue and you will find all the upcoming event parking options.

Don’t miss a second of the big game or concert because you can’t find parking. Our latest release lets you make event parking reservations right in the ParkMobile app. Just select the “reservations” icon, search for your venue and you will find all the upcoming event parking options.

This update also includes minor bug fixes and enhancements.

Don’t miss a second of the big game or concert because you can’t find parking. Our latest release lets you make event parking reservations right in the ParkMobile app. Just select the “reservations” icon, search for your venue and you will find all the upcoming event parking options.

This update also includes minor bug fixes and enhancements.

Don’t miss a second of the big game or concert because you can’t find parking. Our latest release lets you make event parking reservations right in the ParkMobile app. Just select the “reservations” icon, search for your venue and you will find all the upcoming event parking options.

This update also includes important bug fixes and enhancements.

Don’t miss a second of the big game or concert because you can’t find parking. Our latest release lets you make event parking reservations right in the ParkMobile app. Just select the “reservations” icon, search for your venue and you will find all the upcoming event parking options.

This update includes important bug fixes and enhancements

Good news for Masterpass users! We’ve improved the checkout process. No need to log in every time you pay. Just log in once and you are all set. Make sure to reauthorize your Masterpass account to active this new feature.

Don’t miss a second of the big game or concert because you can’t find parking. Make event parking reservations right in the ParkMobile app! Just select the “reserve” icon, search for your venue and you will find all the upcoming event parking options. Available in hundreds of stadiums, arenas and theaters across the country.

You can now purchase season parking packages in the ParkMobile app. Search for your venue and select “packages” to see all the available parking options for the season. Your parking season passes will be stored in the app for easy access.

Apply special access codes to get to exclusive parking deals. On the event page, select “Apply Access Code” to redeem your offer.Screen Shot 2018-08-17 at 12.04.07 AM

You can now purchase season parking packages in the ParkMobile app. Search for your venue and select “packages” to see all the available parking options for the season. Your parking season passes will be stored in the app for easy access.

Apply special access codes to get to exclusive parking deals. On the event page, select “Apply Access Code” to redeem your offer.

Visa Checkout fix for iOS 12
Minor bug fixes and enhancements

* Fix for Resident Discount errors
* Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes, stability improvements, and minor enhancements
Minor enhancements and bug fixes

We added a prominent reminder for the car you are parking on the confirmation screen. This is an easy way for you to double-check that you are parking the right car in your ParkMobile account. If you want to switch cars, you just touch “change” and you will be able to select the car you’d like to park

Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Minor bug fixes and enhancements

•Newly designed interface that shows your active parking sessions, upcoming reservations and account history.
•Other minor bug fixes and UI enhancements

Adds support for zones that have different rates for individual spaces
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Fixed a critical bug that prevented users from accessing some functionality within the app

In-App Chat Support
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Fixes a critical bug that was affecting some users
Bug fixes, stability improvements, and minor enhancements

New Search This Area button for optimizing map searches
Bug fixes for parking availability
Minor bug fixes and enhancements

- View Parking Amenities (e.g. EV Charging, Covered Space) when exploring zone details
- Accept Parking Restrictions (e.g. ADA Parking, Loading Zone) before starting a parking session
- Change or Add Vehicles at the same time as selecting Parking Duration
- Updated color scheme
- Miscellaneous bugfixes

• Updated the Park Map with pins that contain Zone Number
• Nearby pins will combine into groups to simplify the Park Map
• Minor bug fixes and UI updates

- Fixed an issue where users account details would disappear after a period of time
- Performance and stability improvements
- Better integration with accessibility features
- App size reduction
Removed SDKs for unsupported payment methods: Chase Pay, Masterpass, Visa Checkout

New integration to support additional parking garages
Improved password help during account creation
Added pull-to-refresh for Active, Upcoming, and History pages
Fixed an issue with Historical sessions clearing unintentionally
Increased compatibility with device accessibility settings

Introduction of zone grouping that supports multiple zones with the same GPS coordinates
New users can now see a price quote for their parking session without having to create an account
Updated customer support links
Minor bugfixes

* Minor front-end bug fixes
* Routine maintenance to back-end fixes

* Error handling bug fixes
* PayPal and ParkMobile Wallet bug fix to enable use where accepted by the parking operator
* General enhancements

* Parking features will now be included with location details for streets and surface lots in select cities. Easily identify ADA parking and other features with more coming soon.
* General product enhancements and bug fixes

We're frequently updating the app in order to give you the best parking experience. This update includes:

• iOS Keychain Support
- We've listened to your feedback and now you can easily save your password to your device keychain for easy recall.
- For new users, try using the strong suggested password feature to quickly create a secure password and start parking faster.
• BMW Connected Drive
- We've updated our integration with BMW to improve reliability.
• Design and performance enhancements.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We're frequently updating the app in order to give you the best parking experience. This update includes:

• General performance enhancements
• Bug fixes and improvements

We’re frequently updating the app in order to give you the best parking experience. This update includes:

* Spanish Language Experience
° The ParkMobile app is now localized for Spanish speakers. Simply update your device language to Spanish and start parking!
* General product enhancements and bug fixes
